data.eml:eml: New species of Crotonia (Acari: Oribatida: Crotoniidae) from Lord Howe and Norfolk Islands: further evidence of long-distance dispersal events in the biogeography of a genus of Gondwanan relict oribatid mites

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Colloff, Matthew J. (2010): New species of Crotonia (Acari: Oribatida: Crotoniidae) from Lord Howe and Norfolk Islands: further evidence of long-distance dispersal events in the biogeography of a genus of Gondwanan relict oribatid mites. Zootaxa 2650: 1-18, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.198787
